mapper.select: SELECT E.EB_SEQ,M.MI_NCK,I.FI_STOREDNAME,E.EF_ID,E.UC_ID,E.EB_CON,E.EB_DFL,E.EB_RGD,E.EB_REFER,E.EB_STEP FROM FA A JOIN MI M USING(MR_ID) JOIN FI I USING(FI_SEQ) JOIN EB E USING(MI_NCK) WHERE E.UC_ID LIKE 'EB_INQUIRY' AND E.EF_ID=#{ef_id} AND E.EB_DFL='N' ORDER BY EB_REFER DESC, EB_STEP ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nawas.EB(MI_NCK,EB_CON,UC_ID,EF_ID,EB_REFER,EB_STEP,EB_DFL) VALUES (#{mi_nck},#{eb_con},'EB_INQUIRY',#{ef_id}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(e.EB_REFER),0)+1 FROM EB e),0,'N')

INSERT INTO nawas.EB(MI_NCK, EB_CON, EB_REFER, EB_STEP,UC_ID,EF_ID,EB_DFL) VALUES(#{mi_nck},#{eb_con}, (SELECT e.EB_REFER FROM EB e WHERE e.EB_SEQ=#{eb_seq}), (SELECT b.EB_STEP+1 FROM EB b WHERE b.EB_SEQ=#{eb_seq}), 'EB_INQUIRY',#{ef_id},'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE EB SET EB_DFL='Y' WHERE EB_STEP=#{eb_step} AND EB_REFER=#{eb_refer} AND UC_ID='EB_INQUIRY'
UPDATE EB SET EB_DFL='Y' WHERE EB_REFER=#{eb_refer} AND UC_ID='EB_INQUIRY'
mapper.select: SELECT EB_SEQ, MI_NCK, EB_CON,EB_RGD,EB_DFL FROM EB WHERE UC_ID='EB_REVIEW' AND EF_ID=#{ef_id} AND EB_DFL='N' ORDER BY EB_SEQ DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE EB SET EB_CON = #{eb_con}, EB_RGD=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE EB_SEQ = #{eb_seq}
mapper.delete: UPDATE EB SET EB_DFL='Y' WHERE EB_SEQ=#{eb_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT EP_AUTH FROM EP WHERE MI_NCK=#{mi_nck} AND EF_ID=#{ef_id}
